result.reason: The resolution calculation logic in RdpProtocol.cs incorrectly scales logical screen bounds for fullscreen RDP sessions in High DPI environments, causing understated resolution.
result.approach: Update SetResolution in RdpProtocol.cs to accurately calculate physical screen dimensions by using the correct DPI scaling factor for the target monitor when determining DesktopWidth and DesktopHeight.
